title: Ethanolic extract of Parkia speciosa pods exhibits antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties in lipopolysaccharide-induced murine macrophages by inhibiting the p38 MAPK pathway
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Tepparit Samrit, Narin Changklungmao, Kant Sangpairoj, Aticha Buddawong, Pornanan Kueakhai, Kititpong Chuanboon, Prasert Sobhon, Kanta Pranweerapaiboon
